column4: UPDATE 1-Yahoo search engine down shortly after Bing outage
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 2 Yahoo Inc's search engine was down on Friday  shortly after Microsoft Corp's  search engine  Bing  was also briefly unavailable before recovering.
